title: Menjajaki peluang job training di Singapura bagi mahasiswa Pendidikan Kepariwisataan Universitas Kristen Petra Surabaya
abstract: Petra Christian University has given a real contribution for tourism development, especially for the travel bureaus in Surabaya. This is because of the effort of the university to make the students get involved in the job training program in those bureaus. Nevertheless, in order to fulfill the challenge of the tourism development in the next few years, particularly in the global market era 2003, holding the job training program in Surabaya only will not fulfill the demand for professional liuman resources in the tourism field. That is why. the writer wants to probe the possibility of job training in Singapore, as a preparation for the students of Tours and Travel Department of Petra Christian University, to enter the global market era, so that the students will be readv to serve not oniv nationally but also internationally.
contributors: Yacintha Yoranouw Suryawijaya (Advisor 1); LIM TJUANG U (Advisor 2); LANY WARDANA (Examination Committee 1)
subjects: OCCUPATIONAL TRAINING, TOURIST TRADE; TOURIST TRADE-STUDY AND TEACHING
